attributes.action: Cost of living rise for pensioers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to a 17% rise in the cost of food etc. also the rise in gas & electricity also petrol. All the companies that supply the  above products all have a vast increase in their profits.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
